definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: And I want a pen pal in England.
sentences.chinese: 我住在加拿大多倫多市，我想在中國找一個筆友。

sentences.english: In addition, you can try to write English diaries and even make foreign penpals by writing those.
sentences.chinese: 此外，你可以嘗試用英文寫日記，甚至結交外國筆友。

sentences.english: What do you intend to sent to your pen-friend this Spring Festival?
sentences.chinese: 今年春節你打算給你的筆友寄點什麼？

sentences.english: Penfriend Society has been set up for the purpose of promoting friendship.
sentences.chinese: 建立筆友會是爲了促進友誼。

sentences.english: I often write to my pen pal in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 我經常寫信給我在新加坡的筆友。

sentences.english: I live in Toronto, Canada, and I want a pen pal in China.
sentences.chinese: 我住在加拿大多倫多市，我想在中國找一個筆友。

sentences.english: My pen-pal has never been to China.
sentences.chinese: 我的筆友從未來過中國。

sentences.english: I know a penpal from Canada.
sentences.chinese: 我認識一個來自加拿大的筆友。

sentences.english: He is with his pen pal day.
sentences.chinese: 一整天他都要和他的筆友去釣魚。

sentences.english: My pupil Zhang Xiaoling wants to be your pen friend.
sentences.chinese: 我的學生張曉玲想成爲你的筆友。

sentences.english: I really want a Chinese pen pal.
sentences.chinese: 我真的想交一箇中國的筆友。

sentences.english: They have been pen friends for 55 years, I was very touched by the story about them.
sentences.chinese: 他們筆友做了55年，我被他們的故事深深感動着。

sentences.english: I write to my pen-friend once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我每月一次給我的筆友寫信。

sentences.english: Wang Xiong wrote a letter to his pen pal this morning.
sentences.chinese: 王雄今天早上寫了一封信給他的筆友。

sentences.english: I would like a penpal from anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡任何地方的筆友。

sentences.english: Charlie and Li Xiaojun are pen friends .

definition: to apply (for a job)/to reply to a job advertisement
to seek a marriage partner/looking for a mate
to court/to go steady/to be dating
